name: Daynnah Carmona
bio: All completed projects come from my time at 5 Star Media Group's news outlet, ClarksvilleNow.com. They are all 100% produced, shot and edited by me for a wide variety of different subjects. Hopefully these few videos will give you a tast of my style and how I see the world.

videos.title: 5 Star Media: We believe in this community
videos.description: A coporate style project made for the company that houses ClarksvilleNow. It was a very large undertaking that ended up being shared through our corporate headquaters.

videos.title: Go behind the scenes at Silke's Old World Breads
videos.description: Feature video made for ClarksvilleNow.com showcasing a local German bakery.

videos.title: A Look Behind the News
videos.description: A peak behind the scenes of what goes on with ClarksvilleNow.com during the morning broadcasts.

videos.title: Hula Dancing in Clarksville
videos.description: An interesting look at a different culture's beautiful practice, one of the most popular videos for ClarksvilleNow.

videos.title: Meet the Vendor: Sugar Rita's
videos.description: A special feature on a local business owner who would be at a station run event. Getting upclose looks to creative processes is one of my favorite things to do.

videos.title: Local Farms lets you pick fresh Strawberries
videos.description: Nature is one of my favorite elements to shoot, and I had a lot of fun spending the day on this farm.

videos.title: The Gateway Chamber Orchestra brings classical music to local community
videos.description: Feature video for ClarksvilleNow showcasing the very talented musicians in the Gateway Chamber Orchestra.

videos.title: Exploring Natural Areas: Dunbar Cave State Park
videos.description: A very differently paced video showing off some of the quiet beauty you can find in some of my favorite spots in Clarksville.

videos.title: See what's going on at the skatepark in Clarksville
videos.description: I really loved the movement and look of the skate park, and thought it translated beautifully on camera.

videos.title: ClarksVillain Roller Derby
videos.description: A much faster paced video I had a lot of fun with, shooting athletics is always exciting and unique.

videos.title: APSU Football 2017
videos.description: A promo video for our sister station, ESPN Clarksville, for the upcoming football season for Austin Peay State University. I get very inspired by the pace of the game.

videos.title: Cooking With Sarah: White Chocolate Bark
videos.description: An example of a different format that I am very comfortable with. One episode of a series of Cooking videos for ClarksvilleNow.

videos.title: ClarksvilleNow Checks It Out: Ice Skating at the Downtown Commons
videos.description: Another example from a fun series for ClarksvilleNow where our two reporters try new things around town. You never know what you're going to get with these too, and they posts do very well on social media.

videos.title: ClarksvilleNow Reporter Nicole June discovers fall coffee flavors at local spots
videos.description: This video was a great way to showcase some local businesses.

videos.title: Golly G's reveals secret behind signature recipe
videos.description: A local business purchased this video for sponsored content for ClarksvilleNow.com, and we were still able to get creative with it.

videos.title: Where to find last minute summer drinks in Clarksville
videos.description: Another great, seasonal way to show off some local businesses.

videos.title: Cooking with Sarah: Brussels Sprouts
videos.description: With food videos, you never know what to expect, and it's a really exciting subject to shoot and edit.

videos.title: Austin Peay Baseball
videos.description: Baseball was a sport I was not used to shooting, but I discovered some very cool shots.

videos.title: Meet the DiamondBacks, Clarksville's all female football team
videos.description: Meeting these ladies was an experience within itself, and I had a lot of fun editing it.

videos.title: APSU Football kicks off summer practice
videos.description: Music is a big inspiration for me when editing sports footage, and this one is no exception.

videos.title: The Food Initiative inspires youth through farming
videos.description: Beautiful spaces like this one inspired some of my favorite shots.

videos.title: Volunteers bring Thanksgiving fellowship to the community
videos.description: My favorite part of shoots like this is being able to capture moments where people don't realize they are on camera and really getting a sense of them.
